```diff
+ import os
+ from dotenv import load_dotenv
+ from agno.agent import Agent
+ from agno.models.openai import OpenAI
+ 
+ # åŠ è½½ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
+ load_dotenv()
+ 
+ def main():
+     """è¿è¡ŒåŸºæœ¬çš„ Agno Agent"""
+     
+     # æ£€æŸ¥ API key
+     api_key = os.getenv("OPENAI_API_KEY")
+     if not api_key:
+         print("é”™è¯¯: è¯·åœ¨ .env æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­è®¾ç½® OPENAI_API_KEY")
+         return
+     
+     # åˆ›å»º Agent
+     agent = Agent(
+         model=OpenAI(
+             id="gpt-4o",
+             api_key=api_key
+         ),
+         instructions="ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰ç”¨çš„ AI åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œè¯·ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡å›ç­”é—®é¢˜ã€‚",
+         markdown=True,
+         show_tool_calls=True,
+         stream=True  # å¯ç”¨æµå¼è¾“å‡º
+     )
+     
+     print("ğŸ¤– Agno Agent å·²å¯åŠ¨!")
+     print("ğŸ’¡ æç¤º: è¾“å…¥ 'exit' æˆ– 'quit' é€€å‡ºç¨‹åº")
+     print("=" * 50)
+     
+     # äº¤äº’å¾ªç¯
+     while True:
+         try:
+             # è·å–ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥
+             user_input = input("\nğŸ‘¤ æ‚¨: ").strip()
+             
+             # æ£€æŸ¥é€€å‡ºå‘½ä»¤
+             if user_input.lower() in ['exit', 'quit', 'é€€å‡º']:
+                 print("\nğŸ‘‹ å†è§!")
+                 break
+             
+             if not user_input:
+                 continue
+             
+             print("\nğŸ¤– Agent:")
+             
+             # è¿è¡Œ agent å¹¶æµå¼è¾“å‡º
+             response = agent.run(user_input, stream=True)
+             
+             # å¦‚æœå“åº”æ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œç›´æ¥æ‰“å°
+             if isinstance(response, str):
+                 print(response)
+             # å¦‚æœå“åº”æœ‰å†…å®¹å±æ€§ï¼Œæ‰“å°å†…å®¹
+             elif hasattr(response, 'content'):
+                 print(response.content)
+             else:
+                 print(str(response))
+                 
+         except KeyboardInterrupt:
+             print("\n\nğŸ‘‹ ç¨‹åºè¢«ç”¨æˆ·ä¸­æ–­ï¼Œå†è§!")
+             break
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"\nâŒ é”™è¯¯: {str(e)}")
+             print("è¯·é‡è¯•...")
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main() 
```
